title: New website MarrkechGolfer.com Lets Golfer Discover Marrakech and Its Golf CoursesTravelandtourworld.com
text:
New website MarrkechGolfer.com Lets Golfer Discover Marrakech and Its Golf Courses  
Consistently voted one of the must visit cities of the world, Marrakech has become a golf destination in its own right. Currently there are nine golf courses within 20 minutes of the Medina of Marrakech. It truly is an Amazing City with Brilliant Golf.
 
Origin Hotels has developed the website MarrakechGolfer.com with the sole objective of attracting golfers to Marrakech. More and more golfers are looking for different places, unique experiences and fantastic golf. Marrakech has it all. The website allows the golfer to study the scorecards, look at the images, imagine their next exotic golf vacation and start creating a bespoke package.
 
Seven years ago, Robert Hlawatsch, a Stockholm resident bought his first Riad. Since then, Origin Hotels has grown to five hotels, all located in the wonderful Medina of Marrakech. Almost every year Marrakech has seen another stunning new golf course open. The number of golfers staying at an Origin hotel is growing too. Origin loves golf and Marrakech. That’s a good combination!
 
Imagine waking up as the sun rises with the distant sound of the call to prayer. Relax in one of the courtyards sipping coffee and eating local pastries, whilst the hotel whisks your clubs to the course. Play on a Jack Nicklaus or Kyle Philips course with the best facilities, before heading back to enjoy a beer on the roof terrace ahead of exploring the souks in the evening.
 
MarrakechGolfers.com experts are located across Europe, so they understand what every golfer needs. Origin Hotels takes care of everything on-site from airport pick-up to tee times, and from traditional welcome dinners to tours of the souks. It’s quite a golf holiday when there’s the best courses and the best city within a 3-iron of each other.
Source:- IAGTO
